div.p: Freies Deutsches Hochstift Frankfurter Goethemuseum, Frankfurt am Main.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Letter not found; MS is a file copy kept by the Academy. MS annotation: 'Abschrift versandt: 20/IV. 1880' [Copy sent 20 April 1880].

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: für Wissenschaften, Künste und allgemeine Bildung in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: an Herrn Dr. Ferd. Baron von Müller Mr F D H.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: d. Z. Stiftsrath des Freien Deutschen Hochstiftes

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Unter Bescheinigung des Empfanges Ihrer geehrten Zuschrift und Sendung vom (Poststempel 4/IV.) d. J., mit welcher Sie die Güte hatten, uns Ihre Eucalyptographica. Fifth Decade in erfreulichsten Fortsetzung früheren Sendungen freundlichst mitzutheilen danken wir Ihnen verbindlichst und bitten um Erhaltung Ihres ferneren gütigen Wohlwollens für unsere Stiftung.

div.p: for Sciences, Arts and general Culture in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
to Dr Ferd. Baron von Mueller Mr. F. D. H.
Meister des Freien Deutschen Hochstiftes [Master of the Free German Academy]. Government Botanist presently councillor of the Freies Deutsche Hochstift

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
Frankfurt on Main, 17 Easter-month
i.e. April.
1880

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Under certification of receipt of your esteemed consignment of (postmarked 4 April this year
This cannot be the date on which M posted the package. Most likely the package was included in a case of items intended for various recipients that M sent to Wilhelm Sonder, and this date records when Sonder put it in the post in Hamburg.
), with which you had the goodness to kindly convey to us your Eucalyptographia Fifth Decade
B80.13.14. we thank you kindly and request support of your further kindly goodwill for our academy.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

cell.p:
V.
Dr. G. H. Otto Volger.
